title: SMC_GWord_Iterator (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL SMC_GWord_Iterator
This iterator allows to iterate all g-words of a g-sentence.
It can be retrieved from the sentence-queue for the first sentence
(
SMC_GSentenceQueue.GetGWordIterator
), or for any sentence from
a sentence iterator (
SMC_GSentence_Iterator.GetGWordIterator
).
For each sentence, a g-expression token iterator (
SMC_GExpToken_Iterator
)
can be created.
Methods:
Advance
GetCount
GetGExpTokenIterator
GetValue
Init
IsValid
Structure:
Advance (Method)
GetCount (Method)
GetGExpTokenIterator (Method)
GetValue (Method)
Init (Method)
IsValid (Method)
